categories.name: Deterministic Governance Boundary
categories.summary: Governance enforced before execution: default deny, halt on ambiguity, proof-first artifacts.

features.name: Pre-Execution Gate
features.description: Blocks execution unless intent+authority+policy requirements are satisfied.

features.name: Default Deny
features.description: If required conditions cannot be evaluated or are missing, execution is denied.

features.name: Halt on Ambiguity
features.description: Conflicts/unknowns/insufficient provenance trigger a hard fail before routing.

categories.name: Intent Capture & Governance
categories.summary: Intent declared pre-action and bound to execution.

features.name: Intent Packet Schema
features.description: Formal structure for intent, scope, success criteria, TTL, author, authority.

features.name: Intent TTL Enforcement
features.description: Intent expires; expired intent blocks execution.

features.name: Intent Hash Binding
features.description: Intent hash is bound into proof chain and audit pack.

features.name: Decision Invariants Ledger
features.description: Rules like claim→evidence required, no overwrite, authority precedence, TTL/half-life.

features.name: Claim→Evidence→Authority Validator
features.description: Machine-checkable binding of claims, evidence, and authority references.

features.name: Audit-Neutral Export Pack
features.description: Exports sealed facts + hashes + authority + proof bundle without political narrative.

categories.name: Deterministic Replay & Proof Chain
categories.summary: Hash chain + optional signature verification + replay checks.

features.name: Sealed Input Snapshot
features.description: Inputs captured and hashed for deterministic evidence.

features.name: Proof Bundle
features.description: Hash chain across intent, snapshot, authority contract, outputs; optional signature verify.

features.name: Replay Validation
features.description: Validates proof chain presence and readiness for deterministic replay.

categories.name: Repo Radar KPI System
categories.summary: 8 KPI axes, radar render, badge_latest, PR comment, composite history.

features.name: KPI Run Pipeline
features.description: Computes KPI scores and emits render + PR artifacts.

features.name: Layer Coverage Injection
features.description: Appends Decision Infrastructure layer→KPI mapping into PR comment.

categories.name: Economic Measurability (TEC / C-TEC)
categories.summary: Effort/cost modeling, sensitivity bands, complexity scaling.
